titleInfo.title: JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. v. Surek et al

name.namePart: United States District Court Southern District of Alabama

titleInfo.title: JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. v. Surek et al
titleInfo.subTitle: Order enterd re: 19 Suggestion of Bankruptcy filed by JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. It is hereby ORDERED that all proceedings against Defendant Christopher L. Surek are STAYED pending further Order of this Court. This matter remains pending as to Defendant Katherine B. Surek. Signed by Judge Kristi K. DuBose on 9/20/2011. copy mailed to defendants (mca)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 1:11-cv-00263; JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. v. Surek et al;
extension.courtName: United States District Court Southern District of Alabama
extension.docketText: Order enterd re: 19 Suggestion of Bankruptcy filed by JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. It is hereby ORDERED that all proceedings against Defendant Christopher L. Surek are STAYED pending further Order of this Court. This matter remains pending as to Defendant Katherine B. Surek. Signed by Judge Kristi K. DuBose on 9/20/2011. copy mailed to defendants (mca)

titleInfo.title: JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. v. Surek et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting 13 Motion for Default Judgment against Defendant Katherine B. Surek in the amount of $314,912.83 ($295,584.19 for principal, $19,253.64 in accrued interest plus $75.00 in late charges/fees). Plaintiff also alleges it is entitled to attorneys fees and costs. However, in its motion for default judgment, Plaintiff has not provided any support for such request. Plaintiff is ORDERED to file, on or before November 18, 2011, materials it deems necessary to support its claim for costs and fees. The Court will take the matter under submission and a separate Judgment and Decree of Foreclosure, as to Defendant Katherine B. Surek, shall issue in conjunction with this Order after resolution of the request for attorneys fees and costs.. Signed by Judge Kristi K. DuBose on 11/3/2011. (cmj)

titleInfo.title: JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. v. Surek et al
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT AND DECREE OF FORECLOSURE in favor of JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. against Katherine B. Surek. (To be advertised 2/15, 2/22, 2/29, 3/7 and the sale 3/15/12). Signed by Judge Kristi K. DuBose on 2/7/2012. (Attachments: # (1) Notice of Sale) (copies to USM) (cmj)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 1:11-cv-00263; JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. v. Surek et al;

titleInfo.title: JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. v. Surek et al
titleInfo.subTitle: Order re: 29 MOTION to Confirm Sale filed by JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. The foreclosure sale of property be held in abeyance as set out; denying request for publication costs as set out; the request for post judgment and other interest is denied; the proposed deed is approved, as set out. Plaintiff is ordered to file a response concerning amount due to defendant Surek.( Miscellaneous deadline set for 6/21/2012.). Signed by Judge Kristi K. DuBose on 6/14/2012. (cmj)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 1:11-cv-00263; JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. v. Surek et al;

The foreclosure sale of property be held in abeyance as set out; denying request for publication costs as set out; the request for post judgment and other interest is denied; the proposed deed is approved, as set out. Plaintiff is ordered to file a response concerning amount due to defendant Surek.( Miscellaneous deadline set for 6/21/2012.). Signed by Judge Kristi K. DuBose on 6/14/2012. (cmj)

titleInfo.title: JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. v. Surek et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER entered on Plaintiff JP Morgan Chase Bank, N.A.s Response (Doc. 32) to the Courts Order (Doc. 30) regarding its previously filed Motion to Confirm Foreclosure Sale (Doc. 29). The Court construes the Response as a motion to reconsider the prior ruling (Doc. 30) as fully set out. Signed by Judge Kristi K. DuBose on 1/2/2013. copy to USM (hand-delivered) (mca)
